heading: HB04278
0: AN ACT CONVERTING THE TALISAY DISTRICT HOSPITAL IN TALISAY CITY, PROVINCE OF CEBU INTO A MEDICAL CENTER TO BE KNOWN AS THE TALISAY CITY MEDICAL CENTER, INCREASING ITS BED CAPACITY FROM TWO HUNDRED FIFTY (250) TO FIVE HUNDRED (500) BEDS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04278
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONVERTING THE TALISAY DISTRICT HOSPITAL IN TALISAY CITY, PROVINCE OF CEBU INTO A MEDICAL CENTER TO BE KNOWN AS THE TALISAY CITY MEDICAL CENTER, INCREASING ITS BED CAPACITY FROM TWO HUNDRED FIFTY (250) TO FIVE HUNDRED (500) BEDS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
